summary: @RepVeasey: Captain America is in the HOUSE! @ChrisEvans & I talked about how to address gun safety w/out infringing upon the...

summary: Chris Evans talks NATO, Marvel secrets with on Capitol Hill
title: Chris Evans talks NATO, Marvel secrets with on Capitol Hill
excerpt: Actor Chris Evans met with lawmakers on Capitol Hill discussing everything from the North American Treaty Organization (NATO) to Marvel secrets, according to a series of Tuesday tweets.
description:
Actor Chris Evans met with lawmakers on Capitol Hill discussing everything from the North American Treaty Organization (NATO) to Marvel secrets, according to a series of Tuesday tweets.

Evans, who is best known for playing Captain American in multiple Marvel films, quipped that he and Sen. Tim Scott (R-S.C.) would both “turn to dust” if Scott revealed any secrets from the upcoming Avengers film that the pair discussed.

“If you repeat the secrets I told you about Endgame, Marvel will make sure we BOTH turn to dust,” Evans quipped, referencing the fate of multiple characters at the end of “Avengers Infinity War.”

Scott said the pair discussed topics including education, bipartisanship and criminal justice reform.

“If you repeat the secrets I told you about Endgame, Marvel will make sure we BOTH turn to dust,” Evans quipped, referencing the fate of multiple characters at the end of “Avengers Infinity War.”

Scott said the pair discussed topics including education, bipartisanship and criminal justice reform.

summary: @RepJudyChu: It’s one thing to have star power. It’s another thing to use that power to encourage people to learn about the...
caption: • @RepJudyChu: It’s one thing to have star power. It’s another thing to use that power to encourage people to learn about the issues and get involved in politics. Thank you @ChrisEvans for being a real hero and encouraging informed civic engagement.

summary: Imagine during Civil war premiere RDJ yells that Chris Evans has a crush on you, their co-star, and Chris tries to make him shut...
body:
Imagine during Civil war premiere RDJ yells that Chris Evans has a crush on you, their co-star, and Chris tries to make him shut up

Chris: don’t listen to him, he’s drunk

RDJ: i didn’t drink!!

Chris: you’re drunk with your madness

summary: So Chris is back at it again at the Capitol doing the thing.  And one of the Senators posted about it on his twitter... ya’ll...
body:
TTW

So Chris is back at it again at the Capitol doing the thing. And one of the Senators posted about it on his twitter… ya’ll have seen the image I’m sure.

Well, after seeing this, I’m minding my own business and a friend of mine shares the picture as a picture and talks about how cool Chris is. ((Which duh lol anyways)). So I freakout and I’m like MY GUY DID YOU TAKE THIS PICTURE! And sure enough my friend says “yes!” LOL WHEN I SAY MY WORLD IS CONTINUOUSLY SHRINKING, I MEAN THAT SHIT! So ya girl is just shook and low key jealous, cause meeting Chris is like eating Pringles, you can’t just do it once. But I’m so glad he got to meet him while he’s out there doing his political work! Lol just thought I would share!

Looking all kinds of right and shit. Shoutout to my friend for taking a good shot!!!
